item.title: Americano
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml Campari
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 45 ml soda water
  • (garnish) orange slice

Instructions

  1. Build in rocks glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Blood and sand
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml Scotch
  • 20 ml blood orange juice
  • 20 ml sweet vermouth
  • 20 ml cherry liqueur
  • (garnish) orange zest
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a flamed orange zest and cocktail cherry.
